author: andschwa
body:
This should enable building via PR from forks.

This token has read-only access to download the installer packages, but
should nonetheless be revoked and replaced with a wget download when the
repository goes public.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors if this passes, feel free to merge. Then CI testing of PRs will be enabled.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: FWIW this still creates the packages; We _could_ disable that on PRs and save some time. @vors, thoughts?

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @andschwa we can do it as a separate PR

title: Add GitHub token as insecure environment variable
